tool_description: An API showing all the champions in League of Legends and their base stats.
title: League of Legends Stats

api_list.name: Get A Specific Champion's Base Stats
api_list.description: This endpoint returns the base stats of a specific champion.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://league-of-legends-stats.p.rapidapi.com/champions/{name}/stats"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "league-of-legends-stats.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Champion Base Stats
api_list.description: This endpoint returns all base stats from every champion in the game.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://league-of-legends-stats.p.rapidapi.com/champions/stats"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "league-of-legends-stats.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get List of All Champion Names
api_list.description: This endpoint returns a list of all Champion names.
